attributes.action: free prescriptions for people on life long medication.
attributes.additional_details:
i have been diagnosed with a form of arthritis that requires me to take Methetrexate, folic acid and vitamin D. thats 3 prescriptions per month for the rest of my life. i am only 44 and have many more years to work. if i don't take the meds' i can't move my joints therefore can't work...
I would like the government to to make all life long medication free.
arthritic medication should be treated the same as thyroid and diabetic medication..FREE.
